title.narrative: 1.2.1 STRENGTHENED Maternal, Neonatal, and Child Health (MNCH) SERVICES

description.narrative: Maternal, Neonatal, and Child Health (MNCH) services strengthened at District and sub-districts level through developing and implementing appropriate plans by 2016, which contributes to Child Health, Health And Emergencies, Health Systems Strengthening, Health â€“ General, Immunization, Maternal And Newborn Health. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2016, women, children and youth in 20 selected districts, demand and benefit from increased and more equitable utilization of quality health, nutrition, population, education, water, sanitation and HIV services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: MNCH services strengthened at District and sub-districts level through developing and implementing appropriate plans by 2016

description.narrative: Health systems strengthening - District Evidence-based Plans were developed and implemented in 13 districts with support from UNICEF. Increased capacity of health managers and service providers led to improved access and utilization of MNCH services. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2016

title.narrative: Number of UNDAf districts utilizing web-based DHIS2 for reporting of EmOC, IMCI and new born indicators

actual.value: 2016:EmOC, IMCI web-based DHIS2 utilized by all 64 districts, including 20 UNDAF districts30 districts having SCANU-web-based DHIS2 utilized newborn HMIS reporting

title.narrative: Number of UNDAf districts with developed MNCh plan including EPI micro-plans

actual.value: 2016:Reach Every Community (REC) micro-plans implemented in seven targeted low performing districts and three City Corporations.

title.narrative: Number of District cold rooms established and functionin

actual.value: 2016:15 cold rooms in 9 districts installed and functioning

title.narrative: Promotion of the selected districts that have developed the annual MNCH micro-plans, utilized 75 percent of the fund allocated.
